*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| GitHubClient | API Client | Wrapper around Octokit for fetching releases, commits, and issues from GitHub REST API with rate limiting support | github-client.ts |
| calculateDORAMetrics | Orchestrator Function | Main entry point that coordinates fetching GitHub data and calculating all four DORA metrics | dora-calculator.ts |
